headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X Car Meet Rep on Pursuit Series
content:
Bobbing and weaving through oncoming traffic at eye-watering speeds is one thing, but doing it while the LSPD is firing potshots at your tires and setting up roadblocks on the highways and byways? Now weâ€™re talking.

In return for your daring and courage, all LS Car Meet members who compete in the Pursuit Series this week will roll away with double the usual Rep this week.
